name: Bitbucket New Dark
description: Dark style for the new bitbucket revamp.
additional_info:
Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/170337/bitbucket-dark-new-pr-experience.

CHANGES from base:
* fixed title bar color
* fixed org left nav icon colors 

TODO: support for:
* lab: horizontal tab
* user menu
* disabled buttons/actions (grey looks weird on blue background)
* help menu
* text editor
* reviewers input
* various styes on create pull request page
* atlassian product slide-out
